INTERACTIONZ

 

As you may have gotten from the name, this is a library we built to help you handle the interactions in your webpage in an easy way, no doubt this will make your development experience smoother and speed up your process.

Integration Steps

 

 

 

1. Download the library from our Github repository

 

 

2. Add the library to your project

 

 

3. Enjoy creating easy interactions
